title: Belgium to recognise Palestinian state at UN General Assembly
body_text:
- Hamas warns hostages face fate of missing pilot if Israel assault continues
- At least 32 killed in Israeli attacks on Gaza this morning
- Israeli army says it intercepted one of two projectiles launched from Gaza
- At least 65,283 Palestinians killed and 166,575 wounded in Gaza since war began
Updated: October 01, 2025, 7:25 PM
